newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Fortis sees profit up 10-15 pct.
newsitem.headline: Fortis sees profit up 10-15 pct.

text.p: Dutch-Belgian financial group Fortis said on Wednesday it expected full-year net profit for 1997 to show a rise of 10 to 15 percent compared with 1996.
Fortis said its two parent companies, Fortis Amev and Fortis AG, both expected full-year 1997 earnings per share to show a rise of 10 to 15 percent compared with 1996.
Dutch parent Fortis Amev earlier reported a net profit of 224 million guilders for the first quarter of 1997, up from 171 million a year earlier.
Belgian parent Fortis AG announced a first quarter net profit of 3.97 billion Belgian francs, versus 2.73 billion in the first quarter of 1996.
